subtask.title: Review Use Cases and Applications
subtask.objective: Explore practical applications and use cases for each type of LLM agent to understand their real-world relevance.
subtask.scope: Gather examples from industry and research literature to illustrate how each type is utilized.

verification.completion_summary: The collected findings focus predominantly on evaluation methods, protocols, and practical implementation details for LLM agents, emphasizing context management and deployment tools. However, they lack direct examples of specific real-world use cases and applications across various industries, which was the core objective.

covered_aspects: Model Context Protocol (mCP) and context-aware reasoning
Practical implementation of reasoning with tools like LangChain and LangSmith
missing_aspects: Concrete industry-specific use cases and applications
Research literature examples demonstrating real-world relevance
detailed scenarios showing how each LLM type is utilized in practice

missing_requirements: Specific use case examples from industry and research literature
Application scenarios illustrating how each LLM type is practically employed
Broader scope coverage beyond evaluation and technical protocols
